thread.title: Charming hotel in an excellent locationa
thread.title_full: Charming hotel in an excellent locationa - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Marcela L
title: Charming hotel in an excellent locationa
text: this is a charming and cosy hotel. It is located between the Paddington Station and Hyde Park. The staff is very friendly. The rooms are not big but have enough space. The only down point was the breakfast. Since the breakfast room is small, you should book a table in advance. By the time of our chek-in the front desk guy told us that it would be easy to get a table next morning but we had to wait for almost 30 minutes. But the next days we booked a table and it was nice.
